description: This file defines a utility object StringUtils providing static methods for string manipulation, specifically for joining a linked list into a string and splitting a string into a linked list.

classes.name: StringUtils
classes.description: A utility singleton object providing string join and split functions.

methods.name: join
methods.description: Converts a LinkedList into a String using an external join utility.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits a String into a LinkedList using an external split utility.
